title: Himi 52
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Pea ‘e ‘ikai fa’a tu’u,
‘A e kakai angahala,
‘I he fakamaau totonu
‘A hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
2.
’E mokulu ‘a e ngaahi
Fetu’u, mei he langi,
‘E li mo e ngaahi mo’unga
Ki he ngaahi mo’unga.
3.
Ka te tau tu’u ta’e ngaue
Pea ta’e manavahē,
‘I he’etau siofia
‘A e maama ‘oku vela.
4.
‘E vela ‘o ‘osi ai
‘A māmani kotoa pē,
Mo ‘ene ngaahi ngāue
‘I he afi vela lahi.
5.
Pea ‘oku tau hoko ni
‘I he tui, ki he langi
Pea sio hifo, ki he
Maama maumau ‘i he afi.
6.
‘Oku tau fa’a ‘alu hake
‘I he ‘ofa ki ‘olunga,
‘O totofu ‘i he lelei
‘O e ‘api ta’engata. *
